keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting our local economy, backing small businesses and helping them create jobs
Opposing a second runway at Gatwick. Ensuring we have local infrastructure that works for residents
Campaigning for new hospital services to serve this area and supporting our excellent local schools

mentions.candidate: Married to Joanna, living locally, known for being hard working and approachable. Nearly 25 years business experience, supporting local firms and jobs. Served at senior level in HM Treasury and knows how to get things done for residents. Volunteer in a homeless hostel and Credit Union. Works for all constituents. School governor, started a free school for autistic children. Committed to sustainable, working countryside for future generations.

issues.economy: Supporting our local economy, backing small businesses and helping them create jobs
issues.education: Campaigning for new hospital services to serve this area and supporting our excellent local schools
issues.environment: Committed to sustainable, working countryside for future generations
issues.health: Campaigning for new hospital services to serve this area and supporting our excellent local schools
